Producer: Clive Barker, David S. Goyer, Keith Levine, Marc Toberoff
Screenwriter: Ben Collins, Luke Piotrowski, David S. Goyer
Production Co: Spyglass Media Group, Phantom 4 Films, 20th Century Studios
Synopsis: A new take on Clive Barker's 1987 horror classic in which a young woman struggling with addiction comes into possession of an ancient puzzle box, unaware that its purpose is to summon the Cenobites, a group of sadistic supernatural beings from another dimension.
Title: Hellraiser
